## Remarks Implementierungen von <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] sind <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> und <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
